name: UML Use Case Diagram
description:
UML Use Case Diagram Components


In the Unified Modeling Language (UML), a use case diagram can summarize the details of your system's users (also known as actors) and their interactions with the system. 

UML use case diagrams are ideal for:

  • Representing the goals of system-user interactions
  • Defining and organizing functional requirements in a system
  • Specifying the context and requirements of a system
  • Modeling the basic flow of events in a use case

In this file you can find a short explication about the use of the diagram with the components for built it and a simple example.


Bye, have fun!
